text: The 14th Orgburo of the All-Union Communist Party (Bolsheviks) was elected by the 1st Plenary Session of the 14th Central Committee, in the immediate aftermath of the 14th Congress. ==Full members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! scope="col" |Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration ! scope="col" | Note |- ! scope="row" | (1895–1971) | 1 January 1926 | 19 December 1927 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1884–1936) | 1 January 1926 | 9 April 1926 | | align="left" | Relieved of his duties at the 2nd Plenary Session. |- ! scope="row" | (1888–1937) | 1 January 1926 | 17 February 1927 | | align="left" | Relieved of his duties by a Resolution of the 14th Politburo. |- ! scope="row" | (1889–1939) | 1 January 1926 | 19 December 1927 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1890–1986) | 1 January 1926 | 19 December 1927 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1878–1938) | 1 January 1926 | 19 December 1927 | | — |- !
